betapi4.name: F=π^2EI/L^2
betapi4.description: π charges for 1 second before drawing π's blade, dealing major damage and lifesteal until the blade is sheathed.'

effects.title: Locked
effects.text: This spell is locked until "π" is unlocked. (Credit to AceMenace for help)

fish-2.name: Fish Bolt
fish-2.description: Hold down the button to hold the Fish Bolt in place near your player and it will grow and increase damage when held, release the button to lauch it in any direction. This projectile will follow your movement which can be used to aim.

jtrnb-4.name: Grapple Drive
jtrnb-4.description: Dash a short distance stunning those you come into contact with. On a successful hit the cooldown of Spectral Slash will be reset.

txt-2.name: Conexão
txt-2.description: Fires a projectile that pulls enemies closers, applying burn effects and slowing them on hit.

mesoa.name: Blood Pressure
mesoa.description: Teleport and slash through opponents. Hitting the slash will reset cooldown.

cookies-1.name: No Hope
cookies-1.description: Every inflicted stack of Anguish increases this spell's power by 25%. Casting this spell resets them. This spell heals 8 damage over 4 seconds, cleansing you afterwards. You move 50% slower while healing.

zangoose-m2blink.name: Teleport
zangoose-m2blink.description: Blink a short distance. Resets when an enemy hits your Substitute clone.

fish-3.name: Slam
fish-3.description: Charge forward a short distance and stun any enemy hit by the melee strike.

betapi5.name: π
betapi5.description: Channels for 2 seconds as π takes over and uses your body as his vessel. When finished channeling, π will gain a boost in all stats and a reduction of all spell cooldowns.'

effects.title: Locked
effects.text: "π" will slowly unlock itself as it gains energy from attacks that hit enemies. (Credit to AceMenace for code)

mesor.description: For five seconds, cause Injection's reload time to dramatically drop and cause a slow. During the duration, deal 20% less damage and gain 200% lifesteal.
mesor.name: Modified Triage

betapi2.name: y=xπ
betapi2.description: Draw your bow back before firing a projectile at your enemy that does light damage. The projectile is homing, but not guaranteed to hit. Hitting the projectile reduces the cooldown of itself and ΔxΔp>=h/4π.

fish-4.name: Tsunami
fish-4.description: Create 4 projectiles that will surround your player, after a second they will launch out towards your cursor.

jtrnb-2.name: Tri-Blade Barrage
jtrnb-2.description: Launch 3 spectral blades toward your enemies.

txt-4.name: Expulsão/Concussão
txt-4.description: Fires a projectile that knockbacks on close range and roots on long range for 1s, being able to do both.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: The spirits and speed boost will be cancelled if you are hit, or if you cast another spell.

jtrnb-3.name: Blade Burst
jtrnb-3.description: Release a flurry of slashes around you.

fish-5.name: Rip Tide
fish-5.description: Hold the button to use the grapple. Move your cursor to swing it around and thoss your enemies.

betapi3.name: πr^2
betapi3.description: Create a circular shield that temporarily relfects most attacks. It only lasts a very short while, so time it wisely. While your shield is active, you take 31% reduced damage.

mesoe.name: Critical Injury
mesoe.description: Coalesce a spear of blood and strike rapidly, slowing opponents.

cookies-4.name: Invocation
cookies-4.description: Summons a raven that flies around you. Hitting an enemy causes you to cast a Desecrate towards the nearest enemy after 1 second.

zangoose-m2.name: Zangoose - Mewtwo
zangoose-m2.description: Genetically engineered to be the ultimate Pokemon capable of mass destruction, but lacks compassion.

effects.title: Weak
effects.text: Although your mind is strong, your body is weak. You take 10% increased damage from all sources.

betapi1.name: ΔxΔp>=h/4π
betapi1.description: Teleport to your cursor before shooting several projectiles and revealing a projectile from where you teleported.

effects.title: No Hope - Dire Magic - Desecrate - Invocation - Empower
effects.text: A self sustaining attrition class that weaves in and out of battle.

betapi.name: βπ
betapi.description: An apostle of the deity Pi. Prefers far range fights and dedicates most of their kit to escaping and sniping

effects.title: Protection of Pi
effects.text: As an apostle of Pi, BetaPi takes 3.14% less damage, moves 31.4% more quickly, and deals 3.14% more damage.

jtrnb-1.name: Blast Dash
jtrnb-1.description: Dash toward your cursor leaving behind a trail of explosions.

effects.title: At End
effects.text: You take 30% less damage from the void.

effects.title: Energy Source
effects.text: Each hit of Dire Magic increases the healing from Selfish Gains by 75% for 5 seconds.

zangoose-m2psywave.name: Psywave
zangoose-m2psywave.description: Launch a psychic wave that goes to your cursor and returns, pushing enemies towards you on the way back. Marks opponents for 2 seconds, causing Psystrike to deal increased damage if it hits. Briefly gain increased density if Psystrike hits.

mesoq.description: Fire a blood bullet. After firing four bullets, dash and reload for five seconds.
mesoq.name: Injection
mesoq.note 2: please don't use this as an ammo template it literally uses an extra category per bullet before reloading

zangoose-m2substitute.name: substitute
zangoose-m2substitute.description: Create a clone of yourself at your current location and dash backwards. The clone lightly attracts projectiles and if a projectile hits it, it refreshes the cooldown of Blink (for the first projectile only). While Substitute is active, you take 20% increased damage.

cookies-2.name: Dire Magic
cookies-2.description: Does damage to enemies in a line, with additional damage at the end. Hitting an enemy with the end of Dire Magic resets Desecrate.

mesow.name: Surgical Byproduct
mesow.description: Create a silencing pool of blood.

zangoose-m2psystrike.name: Psystrike
zangoose-m2psystrike.description: Unleash the force of your mind with a delayed explosion in front of you, dealing massive damage and pushing yourself backward. Hitting Psystrike sets its cooldown to 5 seconds.

zangoose-m2shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
zangoose-m2shadowball.description: Send an eerie ball of shadows towards your opponent, rooting them for 1 second on hit.

fish-1.name: Ripple
fish-1.description: Jump forward a total of 8 times swaping with object and players you collide with

cookies-3.name: Desecrate
cookies-3.description: Unleashes a magic tendril, inflicting Anguish. Hitting an enemy causes you to dash forwards.

effects.title: Anguish
effects.text: Spells cools down 50% slower for 2 seconds. Can stack up to 2 times. After 2 stacks, Anguished enemies have their cooldowns raised by 50%, up to 2 additional stacks.

txt-1.name: O que o olho não vê...
txt-1.description: Dash forward, leaving behind a portal that swaps your position with enemies on it.

effects.title: Voidborn
effects.text: 20% reduced void damage, but 10% fragile to normal damage.

Tips: Every spell does at least 30% lifesteal, meaning that you will regenerate HP as long as you keep landing your shots.
Lead your shots, some projectiles take a while to reach their target location!
Dodging enemy attacks is just as important as dealing damage.
There many possible class loadouts to choose from. Find the one that best suits your playstyle!
You can save your current loadout and quickly equip saved loadouts - see the top right of your spells on the homepage.
You can customize your controls and keybinds on the Settings page.
You can change your player name and spells by scrolling down on the homepage.
The global leaderboard shows the top 100 active players - find this at the top of the homepage.
You can view spell statistics - look under the hamburger at the top-left of the homepage.
You can switch between Ranked and Unranked by clicking the trophy icon next to your name (top-right corner of the homepage).
View replays of your games - look under the hamburger at the top-left of the homepage.
Hold down the button to swing and release a grapple
